content: Man to Woman: “I don’t believe women have any rights and I believe that gays should be hanged.” Woman to Man: “Wow, what a complete asshole you are. You must be a Republican.” Man to Woman: “No. I’m a Muslim and these are my religious beliefs.” Woman to Man: “Oh, I’m sorry. I apologize. I hope you don’t think I’m an Islamophobe.” http://justnotsaid.blogspot.com/2016/05/liberal-thought-via-dixon-diaz.html
